Uses of Class
org.biohipi.image.BioHipiImageHeader

  • Packages that use BioHipiImageHeader 
    Package Description
    org.biohipi.examples
    Useful examples for understanding the use of BioHIPI.
    org.biohipi.image
    A group of classes for representing and manipulating images.
    org.biohipi.image.io
    A group of classes for reading (decoding) and writing (encoding) images in various storage formats such as JPEG, PNG, NIFTI, DICOM.
    org.biohipi.imagebundle
    Classes for storing and manipulating collections of images.
    org.biohipi.imagebundle.mapreduce
    Classes for processing BioHIBs including producing input splits and reading and decoding image records in the context of a MapReduce program.
    org.biohipi.tools
    Several useful programs to perform analysis operations and basic operations such as import and export of images from BioHipiImageBundle.

    • Uses of BioHipiImageHeader in org.biohipi.examples

      Methods in org.biohipi.examples with parameters of type BioHipiImageHeader 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AvgRGBImage.AvgRGBImageMapper.map(BioHipiImageHeader key, BioHipiImage value, org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
      For each image has returned a set of key / value pairs, which indicate a standard reference value and RasterImage containing the average of the RGB colors.
      void DicomDumpByName.DicomDumpMapper.map(BioHipiImageHeader key, BioHipiImage value, org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
      For each image has returned a set of key / value pairs, which respectively indicate the BioHipiImageHeader metadata and DicomImage of the patient in question.
      void Voxel3dDicom.VoxelMapper.map(BioHipiImageHeader key, BioHipiImage value, org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
      For each image has returned a set of key / value pairs, which indicate the patient's name and DicomImage with the data to be analyzed.
      void VoxelNifti.VoxelNiftiMapper.map(BioHipiImageHeader header, BioHipiImage image, org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
      For each image has returned a set of key / value pairs, which indicate the coordinates and the value of the voxel.
      void CutNiftiImage.CutNiftiImageMapper.map(BioHipiImageHeader key, BioHipiImage value, org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
      For each image has returned a set of key / value pairs, which respectively indicate the BioHipiImageHeader metadata and NiftiImage containing the specific area.

    • Uses of BioHipiImageHeader in org.biohipi.image

      Fields in org.biohipi.image declared as BioHipiImageHeader 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BioHipiImageHeader BioHipiImage.header
      Every BioHipiImage contains a BioHipiImageHeader that stores universally available information about the image such as its spatial dimensions and patient id.
